verses.1: Pasian aw, ka thumna aw hong za inla, gallauna panin kei hong kem in.
verses.2: Migiloteʼ sawm simna, thusia bawlteʼ vaihawmna,
verses.3: namsau taat bangin a leii uh a taatte, thaltang bangin thu hoih lo a ngimte,
verses.4: a buk simna panun mawhbaang lo mi a kapte, lau het loin thakhatin amah a kapteʼ kiang panin kei hong liah in.
verses.5: Amaute in thusia bekbek ngaihsun niloh uh hi. Amaute in thangsiah sim ding gen uh a, “Eite kua in hong mu ding ahi hiam?
verses.6: Eiteʼ mawhna kua in phawk zo ding ahi hiam? Siam mahmahna tawh i sawm simna i vaihawm hi,” ci-in a ngaihsun uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mihingteʼ sung thu le a lungsim ngaihsutna uh thuk mahmah hi.
verses.7: Ahih hangin Pasian in a thaltang tawh amaute kap gawp dinga, amaute khempeuh thakhatin liam ding uh hi.
verses.8: Amauʼ kampaunate hangin amaute siatna thuaksak dinga, amaute a mu khempeuh in a lu uh pei san ding uh hi.
verses.9: Tua ciangin mi khempeuh lau ding uh hi. Amaute in Pasianʼ hih sa thute gengen ding uh a, ama hih sa nate khempeuh ngaih sunsun ding uh hi.
verses.10: Topaʼ nasepna hangin midikte lungdam ding uh a, amah a beel ding uh hi. Lungsim thutangte khempeuh in amah a phat ding uh hi.
